Body:
Description: Hello Team,

Our customer is using Yahoo Mail through the Outlook application. They have a daily report email that is being blocked by a CAP rule. We previously created this rule to block encrypted files. When the rule is active, the email is not sent. However, we do not receive any report indicating that it was blocked. When we disable the rule, they can send the email without any issues.

I have attached screenshots of the rule settings and an example email. Additionally, we reproduced the issue and collected logs, which you can also review.

Best regards
What We've Learned Updated: Customer is having an issue with a CAP policy which blocks mail report.

What We've Learned Updated: Customer is having an issue with a CAP policy which blocks mail report.
Checked the attached logs but could not find anything relevant to the case.
Next Steps Updated: Got back to the client and asked to check again and reproduce the issue.
Next Steps Updated: Followed up with the client. Waiting for their response.

Next Steps Updated: Client confirmed the issue has been sorted on their side.
Closing ticket as resolved.
